tweets.text: The air in my house is thick with landfill fumes tonight. Again. There‚Äôs nowhere to hide from it. You cannot expect us to keep living like this @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe #WalleysQuarry #StopTheStink

It is not getting any better. The gas stink from the landfill is increasing in intensity. A dreadful weekend and again tonight. No one should have to live like this. We are all looking for answers from @EnvAgencyMids and light at the end of this tunnel. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/JPdHJZJBqQ

I wondered if either of you could give an option on our current emissions levels given your expertise @NiralaJacobi @gnigh @DrMickSalt has been monitoring with @EnvAgency but I feel we need greater scientific focus as health issues are increasing @StinkStopthe #WalleysQuarry https://t.co/yyM65aeSZn
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Horrendous last night, still around now, no sleep, gassed form 3 yesterday, still ongoing, shut the place down #stopthestink

If we were in the USA, their EPA would have advised staying indoors and protecting the elderly and children when the H2S from #WalleysQuarry hit its peak over just ten minutes. I wonder how they'd respond to repeated exposure over months @EnvAgency 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/NDvQCA2BSO

tweets.text:
@DrMickSalt @HelenVi00175623 @SarahInNUL @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Looks like Dorket was refused planning to construct another cell.   It must have filled its original site.  

As you say, Blaydon hasn‚Äôt closed but it‚Äôs enforcement was much robust.  It‚Äôs a mystery why with all the breaches and smell, they are allowed to continue tipping.

@DrMickSalt @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Plenty more where that came from. Clayton Hall landfill... 1055 complaints in 3 months. Result = enforced closure by the EA. https://t.co/xPeEt4wRZG

urls.title: Dorket Head landfill site in Arnold closes over 'smell'
urls.description: A landfill site which kept residents awake at night because the smell was so bad closes.

tweets.text: @SarahInNUL @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe It has come to my attention that the Blaydon closure was only temporary, but still, it was more robust enforcement than accepting a voluntary curtailment. Also, I suspect complaint numbers were similarly low for Dorket Head, which was closed permanently (https://t.co/LA0nxaHykq).
Thanks @JuliaBradbury for helping with this hope others can @GreenpeaceUK @DrAmirKhanGP we just want clean breathable air #StopTheStink #landfil toxic air #Newcastle

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @dallydood @BBCRadioStoke @redindustries oh good god thats 9 or 10 in total , come on @EnvAgencyMids enough is enough shut the damn place down ........ NOW before someone get seriously ill or god forbid dies !!!!

I just made my first complaint to the @ICOnews, as the @EnvAgency has failed to give me a proper response *four and a half months* after I made my initial Environmental Information Regulations request. It's supposed to respond within 20 working days. It's been 97. @CampaignFoI.

Just delivered some #StoptheStink leaflets round the estate. A shame that it's necessary for us to have to do this, @NewsNBC, & @EnvAgencyMids, we shouldn't have to endure this ongoing #AirPollution incident üí©üí©üí© https://t.co/ZaJHGBuDLm
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Well obviously @EnvAgencyMids the pathetic approach you‚Äôve taken hasn‚Äôt worked has it . Close it , cap it , jail red !!!

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Wow what a joke @ClareDinnisEA  it looks like you just push the dates out i think the term is kick the can down the road while we all remain ill from the toxic fumes the EA allow us to breath daily.

Come and visit us @pow_rebecca - you may reconsider your 'rotting egg smell' comment and realise people of Newcastle-under-Lyme are struggling to breathe &suffering a multitude of health effects as a result of hydrogen sulphide. @EnvAgency dereliction of duty https://t.co/ewXMbpMqAF
